entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, a student who is being taught by Professor Snape.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, teaching Potions class.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Another name for Harry, used by Professor Snape to address him.

relationships.description: Professor Snape is teaching a class of students, including Harry, how to make potions.
Harry is also referred to as 'Potter' by Professor Snape.
